name: Johnny 33: The Final Saga
description: One of the 150+ games made by Kimberly Kubus, also known as Kim Okkerstrøm, or Sparlatacus. He had created over 150 games in Game Maker since 2002. Generally his games were seen as terrible, but he seemed to love them and kept making them at a furious pace, and he'd established a cult following who loved his games just for how weird they were, not dissimilar to Vasily Zotov and his games.
